info.name: Internal capsule, retrolenticular
info.description: The retrolenticular portion of the internal capsule lies posterior to the lenticular nucleus.  Contained within are most of the nerve fibers connecting the thalamus with the posterior portions of the cerebral hemispheres.  This includes the optic radiation.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Coronal/Occipital to Frontal/7 Cor: Occ to Fr
